attributes.action: be strong in these times and definately NOT RESIGN and be a scapegoat for other ministers troubles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stick to your guns and dont give in,you have done more for the ordinary working class people and the poor,than anyone else has ever done.so please give me your vote as we have a very good and respectable  prime minister.think on what it would be like with previous governments weve had.support gordon.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
